attributes.action: Prevent discrimination against male sixth form students wearing shorts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Male students attending the Thomas Hardye school sixth form, in Dorset, are currently not permitted to wear shorts to shool. The female members of the sixth form however, are allowed to wear shorts, crop trousers and mini skirts. Although feamles, we feel this is discrimination against the boys at our school. It is a violation of human rights. We want equality between the sexes and feel that direct communication should be made to our headoligarch as he has refused acknowledgment of student protest.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
